vendors.name: FluxGen Sustainable Technologies
vendors.description: FluxGen is a Bengaluru-based startup that leverages AI and IoT to provide end-to-end water management solutions for industries and commercial facilities. Their core product, AquaGen, helps enterprises monitor water usage in real-time, identify leaks, and reduce wastage by up to 30%, assisting organizations in becoming water-positive.

vendors.name: Neo San
vendors.description: Neo San is a Bengaluru-based startup specializing in decentralised, 100% electric incineration technology that eliminates reject waste at the source. Their patented 'Unified Core' sustains clean combustion at 1200Â°C with 98% cleaner emissions than industry standards.

vendors.name: Biodegradable Future
vendors.description: Biodegradable Future is a global distributor of patented organic additives that enable conventional plastics to biodegrade in landfills, oceans, and soil. Their technology changes the molecular structure of plastic to attract microbes, facilitating biodegradation into methane and nutrient-rich soil (humus).

vendors.name: Ampacity Energy Private Limited
vendors.description: A leading provider of solar power solutions in India that offers a comprehensive range of services from evaluation and design to installation and maintenance. As an EPC company, it specializes in engineering, procurement, and commissioning of solar power systems for businesses, government agencies, and residential homeowners.

vendors.name: Dexler Energy
vendors.description: Specializes in modular solar parks and turnkey solar solutions for SMEs and mid-sized industries Offers end-to-end services including land acquisition, approvals, and rapid project execution for captive consumption.

vendors.name: Biofuture Additives
vendors.description: Biofuel additives and alternative energy solutions for industrial applications. Specializes in bio-based fuel enhancement and renewable energy integration for heavy industries.

vendors.name: Quark Solar
vendors.description: Solar power company delivering rooftop, utility-scale, and hybrid renewable energy systems. Known for its efficient PV panel installations and smart grid integration.

vendors.name: Kishan Infrastructure
vendors.description: Sustainable infrastructure company focused on green building materials, eco-friendly construction, and urban development aligned with ESG standards.

vendors.name: Solairgen
vendors.description: Renewable energy company delivering solar, wind, and hybrid power plants with expertise in grid stability and microgrid solutions.

vendors.name: Advent Envirotech
vendors.description: Environmental technology firm specializing in hazardous waste management, e-waste recycling, and sustainable disposal solutions.

vendors.name: Digital Paani
vendors.description: Smart water management startup offering IoT-enabled monitoring and AI analytics for water conservation in urban and industrial setups.

vendors.name: Earth Sync
vendors.description: Climate intelligence and sustainability analytics firm providing real-time environmental monitoring and carbon footprint tracking tools.

vendors.name: Snowkap
vendors.description: Supply chain sustainability and emissions tracking platform. Provides carbon accounting, compliance management, and ESG reporting support.

vendors.name: Breathe ESG
vendors.description: ESG data analytics and reporting platform enabling companies to manage sustainability metrics, generate reports, and ensure compliance with frameworks.

vendors.name: Aqverium
vendors.description: Smart water solutions company with focus on digital water infrastructure, leakage prevention, and sustainable municipal systems.

vendors.name: Causal Dynamics
vendors.description: AI-driven platform providing predictive analytics for energy usage, emissions reduction, and sustainability optimization.

vendors.name: Outdid Unified
vendors.description: Sustainable waste solutions company focusing on digital waste tracking, recycling networks, and ESG compliance for corporates.
